title: Midtown Manhattan | MCU Edition
briefDescription: Fan of NYC? and Marvel? Well then this is the perfect map for you! This map is going to be entire midtown manhattan or as ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Fan of NYC? and Marvel? Well then this is the perfect map for you! This map is going to be entire midtown manhattan or as far as i get but with a twist. I have always been a huge MCU / Marvel fan and have choosen to implemented that here. I will include known buildings / locations like Stark Tower, Oscorp Tower, Shield HQ etc etc.
The build is built in heavy detail, from trash cans too posters on buildings. I hope you will enjoy the map and share it! ?
// RevenJoakim / Founder & CEO of Reven International
Explore in the streets of midtown manhattan and recognize one of the worlds most iconic buildings, or maybe build the battle of new york? o.O Its your choice!
Notice not every building will have full interior, but some will. But in the End every building will have the bottom areas fully decorated. Lobbies, Retail stores, resturants, garages etc etc. Just except futher updates ?
Remember also to use the pack FlowsHD when using the map, it was not made for default texture of minecraft. You can if you want but not recommended.
Thanks to Evmanz for making the render of the front picture! <3
Park Avenue Viaduct in front of Grand Central Terminal.
Reven Tower (Stark Tower) built on the location of the former Metlife building,
The viaduct on the east side of the metlife building and towards Grand Hyatt and 450 Lexington.
Street view to 430 Lexington.

title: The Diner [Multiplayer Compatible] ? Horror
briefDescription: One night, you didn't want to cook for yourself so you decide to go to your local diner! But things take a turn, the chef ...

crawledImageUrls.text: One night, you didn?t want to cook for yourself so you decide to go to your local diner! But things take a turn, the chef is secretly kidnapping customers, and turning them into dishes! Will you be able to escape?

title: Reven Private Jet
briefDescription: Reven Private Jet is the second jet in my collection and is owned by Reven International and features complete luxury. Travel to vacations, meetings or ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Reven Private Jet is the second jet in my collection and is owned by Reven International and features complete luxury. Travel to vacations, meetings or something else in style! Relax and watch tv, make dinner or drink a heavy cocktail, the choice is yours!
The jet is coloured in the same colours as a fox to symolize the name Reven as in Fox. (In Norwegian). You get the choice of a landed version and one In air version. Pick one or both! A quick reminder is that this jet also include Full interior so! =)
Built by ; RevenJoakim // CEO & Founder of Reven International
Renders by : Evmanz
RevenJoakim, current CEO and Founder of Reven International, a global (fictional) architecture and construction company always need a fast way to travel to different places on earth. What can be better than a private luxurious jet? ? Well a lot like mansion, iwn skyscraper, cruise ship and you name it.
The jet feature : 2x Bedroom 2x Bathroom 1x Cockpit 1x Kitchen 1x Bar & Living Room 2x Boarding Room
The Private Jet At Day Time!

The Private Jet At Night Time!
Don?t take credit for the build. Don?t change parts and take full credit. Don?t reupload it somwhere else without giving me full credits.!
Thanks! ?
Front Of The Landed Version!
Back Of The Landed Version!

title: Mountain View Inn and Suites
briefDescription: Ooflemump Studios Presents: A large hotel with attractions including a water slide and a pool. The courtyard has two chests containing towels and life jackets, ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Ooflemump Studios Presents: A large hotel with attractions including a water slide and a pool. The courtyard has two chests containing towels and life jackets, coming in two sizes. The first floor has the reception desk and couches with tables and cups. The second and third floor have four rooms each, with two beds, a bookshelf, and a couch. The fourth floor has two suites each with paintings, a couch, bookshelves, and beds. The fifth floor has the access point to the water slide and complimentary meals. We hope you enjoy your stay!

title: Welcome To The Tardis [ClassicEdition]
briefDescription: The Doctor is an ancient Time Lord or Lady. Who Travels through time and space with the T.A.R.D.I.S. (Time and ...

crawledImageUrls.text: The Doctor is an ancient Time Lord or Lady. Who Travels through time and space with the T.A.R.D.I.S. (Time and Relative Dimension in Space). The Doctor is accompanied by companions on adventures.
All of the rooms are connected by corridors so you can easily go from one to another without leaving the building.

Do you consider yourself a true Whovian (also known as a Doctor Who fan)? If that?s the case then you definitely have to download this classic map of the Tardis. The map features many of the control rooms and other TARDIS areas and all of them are based on the ones in the Doctor Who TV show. You?ll start out in the Overworld at a police box and from there you can access the TARDIS!

title: Welcome To The Tardis [Creation]
briefDescription: The Doctor is an ancient Time Lord or Lady. Who Travels through time and space with the T.A.R.D.I.S. (Time and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Doctor is an ancient Time Lord or Lady. Who Travels through time and space with the T.A.R.D.I.S. (Time and Relative Dimension in Space). The Doctor is accompanied by companions on adventures.
Do you consider yourself a true Whovian (also known as a Doctor Who fan)? If that?s the case then you definitely have to download this map and give it a try in-game. The map features many of the control rooms and other TARDIS areas and all of them are based on the ones in the Doctor Who TV show. You?ll start out in the Overworld at a police box and from there you can access the TARDIS!
Creator: MicroJP, Twitter Account, YouTube Channel
All of the rooms are connected by corridors so you can easily go from one to another without leaving the building.

title: Working PlayStation 4 [Redstone]
briefDescription: Finally after many months, the Working PlayStation 4 -the next addition to the "working" series- is available for download! Have you ever wanted to know what ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Finally after many months, the Working PlayStation 4 -the next addition to the ?working? series- is available for download! Have you ever wanted to know what is would feel like to play on a PS4 in Minecraft? Well this map is just right for you!
Click below to see a trailer for the map (it?s amazing) or continue reading for a description of the map:
This map is a recreation of a PlayStation 4 in Minecraft. It uses redstone and a lot of command blocks that allow you to play with and access a variety of different features.
Some of those features include: Minecraft, Sonic Mania, the ability to take up to 20 screenshots and save them to a capture gallery, and MUCH more!

title: Redstone Alternatives
briefDescription: This world explains a way people used mechanisms in MCPE before Redstone was added in 0.13.0. This uses signs, cacti, sand and more to show you ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This world explains a way people used mechanisms in MCPE before Redstone was added in 0.13.0. This uses signs, cacti, sand and more to show you Rube Goldberg-style mechanisms without Redstone. If you need one-time-use doors, are nostalgic, or want to learn about this, this is the map for you!
Do you want to build doors you can only use for one time? Do you want to learn about the history of MCPE? Are you just simply nostalgic? Then this map?s for you! Simple explaination of history: People who played MCPE from release to 0.13.0 didn?t have proper Redstone, so they innovated and created these alternatives. These Rube Goldberg machines use signs, sand, cacti, and more to create mechanisms!

title: Berlin U-Bahn ? U1 (BETA)
briefDescription: Want to explore the Berlin train system?Hop on the line U1! The first part of the Berlin Transit MC series will bring you between ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Want to explore the Berlin train system?
Hop on the line U1! The first part of the Berlin Transit MC series will bring you between Uhlandstra?e along the Ku?damm shopping street, to Warschauer Stra?e along the S-Bahn ring.
To find out more about this line, Google is your best friend!
The beta version 1.0 will present to you the first two stops: Uhlandstra?e and Kurf?rstendamm. The rest of the stations will be released in more versions to come.
The Uhlandstra?e sidings are available for drivers to get minecarts to drive.
Want to be a passenger instead? Fret not. Everyone spawns at a spawn area when they start, so you can choose where you want to go with the click of a button.

What if roleplay is your option? Don?t worry, I?ve got that covered.
SOS Buttons
There are SOS buttons, at least one at each station, on the platforms. These SOS buttons may look simple to you, but no! Each button is hooked to a main SOS centre, where you can roleplay and send help.

Tickets
There are ticket machines at each station. It is a simple ticket dispenser, providing tickets for the appropriate Berlin fare zones.

title: Bouncy Castle Correctional Facilities (Prison)
briefDescription: Brought to you by Potato Studios, welcome to Bouncy Castle Correctional Facilities. This is not your standard prison, and it includes a custom escape route, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Brought to you by Potato Studios, welcome to Bouncy Castle Correctional Facilities. This is not your standard prison, and it includes a custom escape route, mines with resets, a town to escape to, and even a way to help break out your fellow prisoners.
Part 1: Get some friends (The hard part)
Part 2 : Play
How it works is that the Operators are the prison guards and control the prison. They should still stay in survival mode at all times. It is their job to make sure that the prisoners follow their daily routines and do not try to escape. If a prisoner is bad, you can put them in solitary confinement. If they behave, you can take them to the well-behaved prisoner wing. Instructions for the prisoners on how to escape are provided in-game. You can hunt escaped prisoners by following them to town. (Enter the path to town in the yard of the well-behaved prisoner wing)
PICTURES:
